summary: Existing efforts in neurodivergent-friendly coding include Python's intuitiveness, Sona language, and vibe-based coding.
details: Python aids neurodivergent learners with readable syntax, immediate feedback for ADHD, pattern recognition for autistic minds [web:2][web:5]. Sona is an open-source language for neurodivergent creators with OOP support [web:4]. Vibe coding reduces cognitive load via natural language AI prompts [web:1][web:6].
